ingredients.item: 400g pork fillet, trimmed, cut into 1cm slices

instructions.step: Bring a large pan of salted water to the boil. Meanwhile, heat 2 tsp oil in a frying pan and add the onions. Season, then cover and cook gently for 8 minutes. Turn up the heat, then add the mushrooms and fry for 3 minutes, uncovered, until a little coloured. Tip onto a plate and set aside.

Season the pork, then sear in the used frying pan with 1 tsp oil for 1 minute each side. Stir in the paprika, then add the stock, crème fraîche and reserved mushrooms and onions. Simmer for 2 minutes, ensure that the pork is thoroughly cooked, then remove from the heat. Add a dash of Worcestershire sauce and set aside to let the pork rest in the sauce.
Cook the pasta and kale for 3 minutes. Drain, then serve topped with the pork, veg and sauce.
